description: Dried porcini takes this compound butter to the next level with rich and earthy flavour. Serve with steak or chicken.
name: Porcini Butter Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the dried porcini to a bowl and cover with warm water. Leave to soak for 30 minutes. Drain well on and finely chop with the sea salt.
Add all of the ingredients to a large bowl and mix well with a wooden spoon.
Place the softened butter on a piece of parchment paper and shape into a log. Wrap tightly with parchment and twist the ends to secure.
Chill in the fridge for 2 hours before using.
